932:2: munau bruvāṇe'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu|
932:4: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ|
932:5: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam||2||
932:6: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti|
932:7: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā||3||
932:11: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ||5||
932:12: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ|
932:14: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ|
932:15: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau||7||
932:24: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham|
932:25: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā||12||
932:26: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam|
932:27: viśeṣakaṃ yāvadahaṃ karomītyuvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra||13||
932:28: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk|
932:29: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ||14||
932:30: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa|
932:31: bhavecca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra||15||
932:32: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena|
932:35: padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ||17||
932:36: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse|
932:42: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam|
932:47: nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva||23||
932:48: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ|
932:50: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva|
932:53: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca||26||
932:54: tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam|
932:55: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā||27||
932:56: kācit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ|
932:58: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca|
932:59: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe||29||
932:60: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ|
932:61: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ||30||
932:62: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam|
932:64: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce|
932:66: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva|
932:67: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco'bhyuvāca||33||
932:69: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ||34||
932:70: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam|
932:71: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam||35||
932:75: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ||37||
932:76: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena|
932:77: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra||38||
932:78: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī|
932:79: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva||39||
932:80: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca|
932:81: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum||40||
932:83: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa||41||
932:84: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa|
932:85: so'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ||42||
932:87: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ||43||
932:88: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ|
932:89: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ||44||
932:90: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti|
932:91: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti||45||
932:92: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare'pi tathā gatābhimānam|
932:94: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryā-yācitaka“ nāma caturtha sarga samāpta|
